${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Skill3.NAME: As You Wish
${modID}:Skill3.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Unique . NL Double all attack cards cost, played as if played 3 times. Each play has a 10% chance to ${modID}:Stun the target. NL Lose 3 Dexterity.
${modID}:Skill3.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Unique , Innate . NL Double all attack cards cost, played as if played 3 times. Each play has a 10% chance to ${modID}:Stun the target. NL Lose 3 Dexterity.

${modID}:ConcentrateRos.NAME: Concentrate
${modID}:ConcentrateRos.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Draw a card. *Random Exhaust a card, gain 3 Temporary HP.
${modID}:ConcentrateRos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Draw a card. Exhaust a card, gain 5 Temporary HP.

${modID}:FlyRos.NAME: Tactical Flight Evasion
${modID}:FlyRos.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Gain 1 turn Intangible . Gain 2 Dexterity .

${modID}:HeavyAttackRos.NAME: Heavy Attack
${modID}:HeavyAttackRos.DESCRIPTION: Deal 2 sets of !D! single-target damage and 3 points of AoE ${modID}:TrueDamage .

${modID}:PsyStorm.NAME: Psy Storm
${modID}:PsyStorm.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Deal 2-4-8-16... shared damage to all enemies. Number of hits depends on energy used.
${modID}:PsyStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust , Retain . NL Deal 2-4-8-16... shared damage to all enemies. Number of hits depends on energy used.

${modID}:ShieldStrike.NAME: Shield Strike
${modID}:ShieldStrike.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block , deal damage equal to your current Block (affected by damage modifiers).

${modID}:Skill1.NAME: Mind Expansion
${modID}:Skill1.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Unique . Every 3rd attack played each turn is played twice.
${modID}:Skill1.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Unique , Innate. Every 3rd attack played each turn is played twice.

${modID}:Skill2.NAME: Peripheral Blockade
${modID}:Skill2.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Unique . Block does not expire, Annihilation Equipment damage is increased by one-fourth of your Block . Gains of Block are increased by one-third.
${modID}:Skill2.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Unique , Innate . Block does not expire, Annihilation Equipment damage is increased by one-fourth of your Block . Gains of Block are increased by one-third.

${modID}:AddDefend.NAME: Consecutive Block
${modID}:AddDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block . NL If the previous card played was a Skill, NL gain it twice.

${modID}:CommandTerminal.NAME: Command Terminal
${modID}:CommandTerminal.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Unique . At the start of your turn, heal 1 HP, gain [E] .
${modID}:CommandTerminal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Innate , ${modID}:Unique . At the start of your turn, heal 1 HP, gain [E] .

${modID}:Impulse.NAME: Synaptic Pulse
${modID}:Impulse.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Deal !D! damage. Add a copy of this card to hand when killing a card with it.

${modID}:Intimidate.NAME: "Give me war face"
${modID}:Intimidate.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Apply 99 stacks of Vulnerable and Weak to all enemies.

${modID}:Judgement.NAME: Judgement
${modID}:Judgement.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust , Retain . Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Execute permanently adds 0.5 Dexterity and 0.5 Strength.
${modID}:Judgement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain . Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Execute permanently adds 0.5 Dexterity and 0.5 Strength.

${modID}:StealBlock.NAME: Breakthrough
${modID}:StealBlock.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the enemy's Block. Gain Block equal to the damage dealt. Minimum damage is 5.

${modID}:MilliaDisaster.NAME: Millia's Disaster
${modID}:MilliaDisaster.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 ${modID}:Fear to a random enemy each time a Skill is played. Add one *Infected to draw pile.

${modID}:Stable.NAME: Stable Perception
${modID}:Stable.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Unique . When you deal damage, deal an additional 20% ${modID}:TrueDamage .
${modID}:Stable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Unique , Innate. When you deal damage, deal an additional 20% ${modID}:TrueDamage .

${modID}:LoseControl.NAME: Lose Control
${modID}:LoseControl.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. Deal !D! damage (benefits from 3 times *Strength multiplier). If the damage calculated is more than 18, gain 1 *Strength.
${modID}:LoseControl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. Deal !D! damage (benefits from 3 times *Strength multiplier). If the damage calculated is more than 16, gain 1 *Strength.

${modID}:StunSelf.NAME: Cross Defense
${modID}:StunSelf.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! times the energy used as Block. End your turn immediately. NL At the start of your next turn, NL gain half of the Block amount.

${modID}:Infected.NAME: Infected
${modID}:Infected.DESCRIPTION: Retain . Gain 1 Strength when drawn, lose 1 HP at the end of turn.

${modID}:MedBox.NAME: Emergency Medical
${modID}:MedBox.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Play immediately upon draw. Heal !M! HP. NL Cannot be upgraded.

${modID}:AddAttack.NAME: Combo
${modID}:AddAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the previous card played was an attack card, gain 1 *Quick *Attack.
${modID}:AddAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the previous card played was an attack card, gain 2 *Quick *Attack.

${modID}:Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
${modID}:Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity . NL Can be upgraded multiple times.

${modID}:Backpack.NAME: Backpack
${modID}:Backpack.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Draw 2 cards. NL Cannot be upgrade.

${modID}:TouchingStars.NAME: Touching Stars
${modID}:TouchingStars.DESCRIPTION: Innate , Retain , Exhaust , ${modID}:Unique . NL Deal !D! ${modID}:TrueDamage. Reduce cost by 1 each turn.
${modID}:TouchingStars.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate , Retain , Exhaust , ${modID}:Unique . NL Deal !D! ${modID}:TrueDamage. Reduce cost by 1 each turn.

${modID}:Extend.NAME: Mind Extension
${modID}:Extend.DESCRIPTION: Retain , Exhaust . Deal !D! damage. Damage increases by twice the number of identical cards in hand each turn.

${modID}:ExtendP.NAME: Inception
${modID}:ExtendP.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 *Mind *Extension to hand at the start of each turn and now.
${modID}:ExtendP.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate . Add 2 *Mind *Extension to hand at the start of each turn and now.

${modID}:GetReady.NAME: Get Ready
${modID}:GetReady.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength . NL Gain [E] [E] and 10 Block at the start of next turn, NL and draw 2 additional cards.
${modID}:GetReady.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Strength . NL Gain [E] [E] [E] and 20 Block at the start of next turn,  NL and draw 3 additional cards.

${modID}:TacticalGuide.NAME: Tactical Guidance
${modID}:TacticalGuide.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Exhaust all your cards and draw that many +1 cards.
${modID}:TacticalGuide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all your cards and draw that many +1 cards.

${modID}:Hunter.NAME: Hunter
${modID}:Hunter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then deal half the ${modID}:TrueDamage bypassing Block.

${modID}:Slay.NAME: Prey
${modID}:Slay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, gain Temporary HP equal to half the ${modID}:TrueDamage bypassing Block.

${modID}:AfterShock.NAME: AfterShock
${modID}:AfterShock.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Next 2 Attack cards played also play *Quick *Attack .
${modID}:AfterShock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Next 4 Attack cards played also play *Quick *Attack .

${modID}:FallOut.NAME: Fallout
${modID}:FallOut.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Deal !D! damage to the first enemy, bouncing damage to enemies behind. Damage reduces by 4 each bounce until it reaches 0 or less.

${modID}:ForgetMeNot.NAME: Forget Me Not
${modID}:ForgetMeNot.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust , ${modID}:Unique . NL Deal ${modID}:TrueDamage equal to 40% of the enemy's missing HP to all enemies.
${modID}:ForgetMeNot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust , ${modID}:Unique . NL Deal ${modID}:TrueDamage equal to 50% of the enemy's missing HP to all enemies.

${modID}:React.NAME: Adaptability
${modID}:React.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy's intent is to attack, give 2 ${modID}:Fear . Otherwise, deal !D! damage.
${modID}:React.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy's intent is to attack, give 3 ${modID}:Fear . Otherwise, deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Switching.NAME: Tactical Exchange
${modID}:Switching.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Choose to swap Strength and Dexterity.
${modID}:Switching.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust , Innate . Choose to swap Strength and Dexterity.

${modID}:Fitting.NAME: Battle Instinct
${modID}:Fitting.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy's intent is to attack, gain 1 Dexterity , otherwise gain 1 Strength .

${modID}:Refresh.NAME: Revitalize
${modID}:Refresh.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your current negative effects.

${modID}:SolidifyMind.NAME: Emotional Fortification
${modID}:SolidifyMind.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Convert one-third of your current Block to Temporary HP.
${modID}:SolidifyMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Convert one-half of your current Block to Temporary HP.

${modID}:Lullaby.NAME: Lullaby
${modID}:Lullaby.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Stun all enemies for two turns.

${modID}:FaceYourSin.NAME: FaceYourSin
${modID}:FaceYourSin.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to the enemy equal to its current intent's damage. Damage source is considered the enemy. If intent is not an attack, give 2 ${modID}:Fear .
${modID}:FaceYourSin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to the enemy equal to its current intent's damage. Damage source is considered the enemy. If intent is not an attack, give 4 ${modID}:Fear .

${modID}:Sleepy.NAME: Sleepy
${modID}:Sleepy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal . Upon being exhausted, gain [E] next turn. Unupgradable.

${modID}:Endophobia.NAME: Endophobia
${modID}:Endophobia.DESCRIPTION: Add one *Infected to draw pile, give all enemies 2 ${modID}:Fear , then deal !D! damage.
${modID}:Endophobia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add one *Infected to draw pile, give all enemies 3 ${modID}:Fear , then deal !D! damage.

${modID}:OptionAttack.NAME: Originiums Blade: Attack
${modID}:OptionAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:AMOS.NAME: A.M.O.S
${modID}:AMOS.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Add 2 *Inheritors and *Outriders to the draw pile.

${modID}:Inheritors.NAME: Outriders
${modID}:Inheritors.DESCRIPTION: Trigger either *Primordial Blade: Defend or *Primordial Blade: Strike.

${modID}:Outriders.NAME: Inheritors
${modID}:Outriders.DESCRIPTION: Trigger either *Primordial Blade: Block or *Primordial Blade: Attack.

${modID}:Spiritualization.NAME: Latelean purification ticket.
${modID}:Spiritualization.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust , Retain . Exhaust all State and Course in your hand. Each provide [E] and draw 1 card.

${modID}:WhoAreYou.NAME: WhoAreYou
${modID}:WhoAreYou.DESCRIPTION: Innate . [#19FFF9]Who am I???[] NL Gain Confusion.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I always get 'he' and 'she' mixed up. In Chinese, it's just 'ta' – so simple.
I still want to say, in another life, I really enjoyed doing laundry and taxes with you.
Yours sincerely, to the unstoppable heartbeat and the original you.
